Articles.Content:
Made in under 30 minutes at the Houston Lego KidsFest. Not the best, but I did what I could without any 2x1 bricks. Those darn kids...

I wasn't the oldest one there by far, but I sure felt like it. Anyway, Lego KSP.

Kinda makes me want to break out all my old Lego and do a full-size with proper curves... If only I had those lime-green bricks.
Nice, Legos are awesome as is KSP!
